author: THE EDITORIAL BOARD
title: Why Are U.S. Bombs Killing Civilians in Yemen?
description: The United States, by providing weapons and support to the Saudi-led coalition waging indiscriminate war in Yemen, shares in the blame.
content: The top American air commander in the Middle East voiced frustration in an interview last week over the murderously incompetent Saudi-led air campaign in Yemen. Though welcome, his sentiment was far too mild. It should have been more like horror — and shame o… [+1154 chars]
fileName: Why Are U S Bombs Killing Civilians in Yemen
text: The United States, by providing weapons and support to the Saudi-led coalition waging indiscriminate war in Yemen, shares in the blame.
